entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:57 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
